topic.title: Upgrading to Greenplum 6
topic.shortdesc: This topic identifies the upgrade paths supported for upgrading a Greenplum Database 6.x release to a newer 6.x release. The topic also describes the migration paths supported for migrating a Greenplum Database 4.x release, or a Greenplum 5.27 or earlier release, to a Greenplum 6.x release.

body.p: Greenplum Database 6 supports upgrading from a Greenplum 6.x release to a newer 6.x release. Direct upgrade from Greenplum 5.28 and later to Greenplum 6.9 and later is supported via gpupgrade; for more information, see the gpupgrade documentation. Direct upgrade from Greenplum Database 4.3, or from Greenplum 5.27 and earlier, to Greenplum 6 is not supported; you must migrate the data to Greenplum 6.
